name: Cathartic Resonance
description:
It's been years since Thunder Science was cleared out, but it appears a certain group is looking for avengence at the hilariously ironic backfire of their own attempt at world conquest by piggy-backing off of a Science Company...

And now, a kidnapping has occured, and only YOU, followed by Piter Windski and Dr. Susan Summer, to rescue Jane Summer, granddaughter of Susan.

Run 'n' Blast your way through floors of the new arised test facility, re-claim the power cells needed to hijack the stasis chamber that Jane is kept inside, Meet some zany folks, Do some steel-hard platforming, Classic Mega-Man style, and try to show some Goo Dragon-Worshipping Cultists WHO's boss.

Hi, this is the release for the Tutorial Demo. Currently, i got a few things complete for the game, such as:

The Intro...

The Tutorial...

...Aaand a bit of the gameplay that is not publicly accessible because it's a testing playground, obviously... But that's about it.

If you wish to help me out on the game, (Which i'll really be glad if you do, because one-manning an entire project is a REAL pain in the arse.) you can join my Discord and contact me from there! Even basics things like Playtesting are beyond helpful, but Artists specially, A LOT more. I'm no big artist or anything. Otherwise, you can just stay in the server and get up to mischief and tomfoolery!
